title: NFL Draft Recap: AFC Winners & Losers + Big Trades - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/3
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason react to the 2022 NFL Draft! What’s the fantasy football fallout from A.J. Brown traded to the Eagles and Hollywood Brown to the Cardinals? Plus, DeAndre Hopkins suspended, and the biggest fantasy winners and losers from every AFC team! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 3rd, 2022.

Pre-order the 2022 UDK at UltimateDraftKit.com at the lowest price before June 1st -- Get instant access to Dynasty Startup & Rookie Rankings

(04:10) - NFL News
(04:20) - Marquise Brown Traded to Cardinals
(10:20) - A.J. Brown Traded to Eagles
(14:50) - Josh Jacobs
(15:00) - Mike Davis, Cordarrelle Patterson
(17:00) - DeAndre Hopkins Suspended 
(19:30) - NFL Draft Winners & Losers
(19:40) - Jacksonville Jaguars
(20:55) - Houston Texans
(23:55) - Indianapolis Colts
(27:40) - Tennessee Titans
(34:05) - Cleveland Browns
(35:50) - Baltimore Ravens
(37:55) - Pittsburgh Steelers
(41:05) - Cincinnati Bengals
(41:55) - New York Jets
(46:55) - Miami Dolphins
(47:40) - New England Patriots
(54:15) - Buffalo Bills
(55:30) - Denver Broncos
(57:00) - Los Angeles Chargers
(59:30) - Las Vegas Raiders
(01:00:20) - Kansas City Chiefs
